snippet: Malala Yousafzai, the teenaged Pakistani girl who was shot by the Taliban in 2012 because of her activism for girls education, has announced the first grant in an international fund set up in her name.
abstract: Malala Yousafzai, the teenaged Pakistani girl who was shot by the Taliban in 2012 because of her activism for girls education, has announced the first grant in an international fund set up in her name.

headline.main: Malala Yousafzai Announces Grant for Girls' Education
